title: Find Position of Substring
description: This function, FINDP, searches for the position of a specified substring (src) within a given string (str), starting the search from a defined position (pos). If the substring is found, its position is returned; otherwise, the function returns 0.
name: FINDP

input.name: str
input.description: The string in which to search for the substring.

input.name: src
input.description: The substring that is being searched for in the main string.

input.name: pos
input.description: The position from which to start searching in the main string.

return_value.description: The position of the first occurrence of the substring; returns 0 if the substring is not found.
